userEnrollmentNotifications: New User Registration: Alert when a new user signs up, especially for open enrollment courses.
Enrollment Requests: Notification when a user or manager requests enrollment in a paid or restricted course (requires approval).
Certification Completion: Alert when a user successfully completes a required course or obtains a major certification.
Account Deactivation/Suspension: Notification when a user account is manually or automatically deactivated.
systemTechnicalAlerts: Payment/Subscription Failure: Urgent alert if the company's subscription to a third-party service (e.g., cloud hosting, payment gateway) is failing.
Integration Error: Notification if API calls to integrated services (e.g., HRIS, CRM) fail repeatedly.
Scheduled Maintenance: Notification to remind admins about upcoming maintenance windows for the LMS.
